body:
Hi to all that read this. I'm spanish player that get banned from [Removed] for do nothing. I decided to leave minecraft, but i know that avicus can give me all the things that overcast network gives to me. And also i have so me question about the server:

- There are here any tournament or special event?
- There are spanish players active on avicus?
- And for the end, how i can help in this server, beacuse i think that all the staff is english and if there are some spanish players, they need a mod that helped him in their native languaje, and i have experience on some servers and matured.

Thanks for see this, regards =D
body_tagged:
Hi to all that read this. I'm spanish player that get banned from [Removed] for do nothing. I decided to leave minecraft, but i know that avicus can give me all the things that overcast network gives to me. And also i have so me question about the server:

- There are here any tournament or special event?
- There are spanish players active on avicus?
- And for the end, how i can help in this server, beacuse i think that all the staff is english and if there are some spanish players, they need a mod that helped him in their native languaje, and i have experience on some servers and matured.

Thanks for see this, regards =D
title: Hello =D

replies.body:
There are tournaments, just not nearly as often as OCN.
There may be a few Spanish players, but I wouldn't call it a community.

There's no point in deleting something that wasn't breaking any rules, dooz.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Welcome to Avicus :D

There is an upcoming tourney planned hopefully for the near future. There are many Spanish regulars here as well. If you have any other questions or concerns don't be afraid to contact a staff member :)

replies.body: Yes, if you look under the "Teams" section on the left hand side of the website you will find all team/clan related things :D

reply_to.body: Thanks :D and there teams or some things like that?
reply_to.body_tagged: Thanks :D and there teams or some things like that?

replies.body:
Weeeeelcome to the Avicus Comunnity!

  1. There will be tournaments and that stuff. Other people already answer this question in others replies.
  2. Of course they are! Like me. So Hola, me llamo Netox (Netux en ingles) y bla bla bla... pero prefiero hablar en ingles ^_^. Another cool guy you will found here is Evocal, he is a MapDev so that means "part of the Staff" =D
  3. You already help this servers by joining every day and having fun! But if you want to Donate and you are able to that would help the server a lot more ^.^
    If you want to become a Staff member you need to make an apply when applications are open (not right now sadly)

replies.body: Welcome to Avicus! The best way to help is to just make a map! You can submit maps at the forum post Map Releases!
